DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in order to collect clinical samples from patients who are diagnosed of having chickenpox infection. The results of this study will provide basic scientific information about chickenpox disease.
DOC.brief_title: Detection and Characterisation of Varicella Zoster Virus From Dermal Lesions of Chickenpox-infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The study involves NO therapeutic or prophylactic treatment nor further observation of the patients. There is no product to be tested in this study.
DOC.criteria: Pediatric patients who are diagnosed of having varicella and are presenting varicella dermal lesions.
